bug.author: aaronmarkham
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Searching for while in the 1.0.0 version yielded a result: <denchmark-link:http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.0.0/search.html?q=allreduce&check_keywords=yes&area=default>http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.0.0/search.html?q=allreduce&check_keywords=yes&area=default</denchmark-link>
But this just dumps you off in the gluon docs at the top. Searching on master yields a correct result. I recently worked on search, fixing some other bugs and tested that some APIs should not appear in old results. Could be the same issue or something new.

comments.comment:
Thanks for submitting the issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/aaronmarkham>@aaronmarkham</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mxnet-label-bot>@mxnet-label-bot</denchmark-link> [Website, Bug]
I have a lead on the problem. Stay tuned.

I'm capturing this issue here for later followup: <denchmark-link:https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MXNET-998>https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MXNET-998</denchmark-link>
As the issue isn't happening anymore and seems transient, I'm closing this.
